attributes.action: An EYE for an EYE, Sentences that fit the crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned ask the prime minister to bring in sentances for criminals that committ the most hidious of crimes and let them suffer the pain and agony that they forced onto their victims. Victims like baby P, Ainlee Walker, Tiffany Wright who had no chance yet were subjected to unspeakable torture and neglect, yet the ones responsible get a "holiday" in our so called overcrowded prisons.

AN EYE FOR AN EYE, YOU DO TO THEM, WE DO TO YOU. Stop being politically correct and all for "human rights" people like that lose all rights to be human when crimes like that are committed. SO GORDON BROWN, IMAGINE IT WAS YOUR CHILD??? BE A MAN AND TAKE ACTION

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
